terms.definition: An electronic device for storing and processing data.
The data that is entered into a computer system.
The manipulation of data by a computer.
The information produced by a computer after processing.
The retention of data in a computer system.
The transmission of data between computer systems.
Raw facts and figures without context.
Data that has been processed and has meaning.
The physical components of a computer system.
The programs and other operating information used by a computer.
The software that supports a computer's basic functions.
The process of starting up a computer and loading the operating system.
A lightweight computer that relies on a server for data processing.
Programs designed to perform specific tasks for users.
A computer that is integrated into other devices to perform specific functions.
A portable computing device such as a smartphone or tablet.
A mobile phone with advanced features and computing capability.
A portable touchscreen device used for multimedia consumption.
A general-purpose computer designed for individual use.
A computer designed to be easily moved and used in various locations.
